extendedInfo.description: Have you ever tried parking an eighteen wheeler in your life? Think it's easy ? No way! Try your skills with our Trucker Parking 3D. In this truck parking game, you can choose between 3 different trucks, 50 parking lot levels and unlimited entertainment. You will be presented with different environments including a military area, the Chicago skyline and an airport. Parking a truck becomes serious challenge in these varying environments! Do you think you can part the truck in every situation? Challenge yourself by trying to be as fast as you can.In this truck game you will find:- 3 Truckers including an Oil Tanker, American Trucker and Russian Trucker- 3 Challenging environments including Military Base- Ability to skip level, if you desire- Ability to use Steering or Accelerometer controls- 4 Different Camera Angles for ease of controlThe game uses superior graphics tailored for high end devices like the Samsung Galaxy S4 and Nexus 7. More levels coming soon!

reviews.title: Almost
reviews.comment: This game would be great if it wasn\'t for the poor physics on the truck. In real life you can almost  jack knife the truck when turning and it doesn\'t happen in this simulator. Sort this out and you get 5 stars. Good effort though.
reviews.author: Steve Ackrell

reviews.title: Not good but not bad..
reviews.comment: It\'s a nice game. But it\'s controller is very difficult..
reviews.author: shubham chandan

reviews.title: Game wouldnt even start
reviews.comment: App dowloaded fine, got through the menus with a few ads and the level wouldnt start, just a blue screen!
reviews.author: Cassandra walsh

reviews.title: Sony Xperia Go
reviews.comment: Controls have too much lag &  heavy ad interference. Not worth the trouble.
reviews.author: Safeer Gafoor

reviews.title: A few problems
reviews.comment: Has been said before but the physics of the truck are poor. Also when in the windscreen view the wing mirrors are reversed (left is right and right is left). Fix for 5 star as general gameplay good
reviews.author: Matt Fippard

reviews.title: Hard lock + crash
reviews.comment: Galaxy s2. Hardlocked my.phone couldnt even get to the task manager to kill it. Carefull
reviews.author: Mike Demont

reviews.title: I9000 cm10.1
reviews.comment: The game works ok until I start a mission and then when loading it crashes
reviews.author: Marius Sy

reviews.comment: Ads galore and glitchy on the S4. Can\'t steer the truck and press the gas at the same time because one or the other won\'t work.
reviews.author: CHRIS GILES

reviews.title: Xperia play
reviews.comment: This game when I go onto level 1 it just blue screens and freezes
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: Would be more stars if every stage wasn\'t the same just with 1 extra turn. Kinda boring because of that
reviews.author: brian therrien

reviews.title: Bad be carefull when downloading this game
reviews.comment: When i downloaded this game and started to play it my phone shut down on a full battery then when i went to turn it on some of my items were missing. It shouldent even get 1 star its that bad
reviews.author: Cara Thomson

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Very interest to play and can improve some more levels
reviews.author: Amuthan Raji

reviews.title: Could be awesome with a few tweaks but right now not so much
reviews.comment: Trailer turning is unrealistic, trailer slides sideways when turning, the steering is just crappy, its too inconsistant, also a steering direction indicator to show how sharp your wheels are turned would be very useful. Even on my big tablet screen its hard to tell. Otherwise, very cool game, it could even be used as a training simulator for trucking companies or the usdot! Also, fix the other  trailer turning issue. Last time I checked, you could jackknife a trailer more than 30 degrees, needs to lock at 85 or 90 degrees, especially on levels where you have a hard 90 into the finish. The menu interface could use some streamlining, sucks to go all the way back to the main menu when you exit gameplay, a lot of extra steps when you just want to change levels.
reviews.author: Josh O

reviews.title: Fun but needs work
reviews.comment: Its a frear game but you can\'t do wheel and gas at the same time needs fixing with the brake and stuff
reviews.author: Rashed Elbaba

reviews.title: Terrible controls
reviews.comment: Steering using the on screen steering wheel is impossible. You also have to ability to tilt the phone to steer using the phone accelerometer, which is also terrible and the trucks turn hard right as soon as the game starts everytime. I have a Galaxy S3 and my friend has an iPhone 4S same problems on both. Dont waste your time.
reviews.author: Lucas Wright

reviews.title: Cool and  shouldn\'t be slow...
reviews.comment: It works really slow sumtimes.... unfortunately..
reviews.author: Rahim Shaikh

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Took me forever to download because out was in bumblefuck new York (Oneida ) and it sucks. Waste of time.
reviews.author: Swaggg Ha

reviews.title: Good game... But push ads!?
reviews.comment: Quite a good game. I don\'t know about the real physics of a truck so can\'t say anything on that... But well done for sneakily putting push ads into it!! I\'ve been wondering for weeks which app the little orange star had been coming from. I even used those \'ad detector\' apps but nothing came up! But then I remembered that you can hold down the push ad and tap \'app info\' which lead me to this app! I wouldn\'t mind the app being in the game... But push ads are just SO annoying!!!
reviews.author: James Bonner

reviews.title: Glitch
reviews.comment: The game is pretty good but on level 3:12 I think it is the last level there is not a designated spot to park the truck
reviews.author: jay will

reviews.title: Solid parking game
reviews.comment: Its seems easier to control from the cab then the birds eye views, although it takes some getting used to because of the tiny mirrors. I\' ve downloaded similer truck parking games and deleted them because the steering controls were horrible. This game at least is visually appealing and the controls are better.
reviews.author: Gary Salud
